name: Archivist
questions: You've been having strange dreams about the factory's machinery. What do you see?
You've been noticing discrepancies in the factory's inventory. What's missing?

actions.name: Assess
actions.description: Think before acting. Catalog the possible advantages and consequences of a course of action.

actions.name: Study
actions.description: Research a topic or item. Gain insight into its function or history.

professionalBonds.name: Alma
professionalBonds.description: An expert in the scrawlings of the mad creator. Old, sick, and quite mad themselves.

professionalBonds.name: Utthas
professionalBonds.description: A worker who's been skimming off the top of the inventory. They're in over their head and need help covering their tracks.

name: Enforcer
shortDescription: Keep the fear and enforce the rules
questions: Why do you do the overseers' bidding? What happened to you?
You know a flaw in the overseers' penal pen security. What is it?

actions.name: Frighten
actions.description: Use fear as a blunt instrument.

actions.name: Observe
actions.description: Watch and learn. Gain insight into a person or situation.

professionalBonds.name: Hellet
professionalBonds.description: An overseer who's willing to do favors in exchange for your help advancing their career.

professionalBonds.name: Borani
professionalBonds.description: An enforcer who uses torture to get what they want.

name: Machinist
questions: You've found a hidden compartment in the machinery. What's inside?
A friend got lost in the matrix and you had to leave them behind. What happened?

actions.name: Interface
actions.description: Work with the machinery to accomplish a task.

actions.name: Squeeze
actions.description: Get into or out of a tight spot.

professionalBonds.name: Rasha
professionalBonds.description: A stranger who's been living in the machines for years. You've never seen them, but they talk to you.

professionalBonds.name: Geleswin
professionalBonds.description: An experienced machinist who's a master contortionist.

name: Operator
questions: What form of medidation have you learned to stave off the boredom?
A fellow worker hasn't been meeting quotas and you're not strong enough to cover for them. Who are they?

actions.name: Disconnect
actions.description: Fortify your mind against upsetting stimuli.

professionalBonds.name: Sigsvult
professionalBonds.description: A shaman whose salves and tinctures ease the pain of the factory's labor.

professionalBonds.name: Nimund
professionalBonds.description: An operator who is a monster of a person. They could do the work of three people if they chose to.

name: Runner
questions: Two overseers are plotting against each other. What are they planning?
An overseer took a shipment from you and framed you for it. What was in the shipment?

actions.name: Carry
actions.description: Traverse the factory while under a heavy load.

actions.name: Eavesdrop
actions.description: Listen in on a conversation without being noticed.

professionalBonds.name: Tovarus
professionalBonds.description: A runner who claims to have seen the outside world.

professionalBonds.name: Gelimer
professionalBonds.description: A community leader who uses runners to keep tabs on the overseers.

name: Scrapper
shortDescription: Sort broken parts and salvage scrap
questions: You've found a nearly functional weapon meant for Fenrir's soldiers. What is it?
All your life you've heard whispered stories about the curse of the scrapyard. What have you experienced that makes you think they're right?

actions.name: Rummage
actions.description: Search through refuse for something useful.

professionalBonds.name: Lorel
professionalBonds.description: A scrapper who's been hoarding useless scrap for years.

professionalBonds.name: Lorya
professionalBonds.description: An overseer with a penchant for collecting rare and dangerous materials.

name: Stoker
shortDescription: Shovel tar and stoke the fires
questions: You see something in the smoke and flames no one else does. What is it?
The overseers thought it would be funny to lock you all in the furnace room. Who did you lose that day?

actions.name: Brace
actions.description: Prepare for a sudden pain or shock.

actions.name: Fuel
actions.description: Inflame a fire or strong emotion.

professionalBonds.name: Wilgefort
professionalBonds.description: A stoker who's learned to direct steam to other parts of the factory.

professionalBonds.name: Gisa
professionalBonds.description: A worker who swears the water from the overflow vents has healing properties.
